name: BLACKBOX (itch) (ficuno)
description:
BLACKBOX

A black box is a system that can be observed based on what goes in and what comes out, without any understanding of what is happening inside

 

Build structures

Crank out resources

Become the best system

 

Made for PlayJam 2 in Pulp.

 

── MANUFACTURING ──

 

PROCESS speed not to scale

 

MANUAL

 

────────────────

 

Controls:

A - confirm prompts.

B - opens menu: demolish, build conveyor, and build structure.

D-Pad - move and select.

Crank - opens menu and selection: select variations of conveyor belt and structures.

 

DOWNLOAD & INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

For Playdate console:

Installation guide from Panic's official instruction here.

 

For Windows/Mac: 

  1. Download and Install the Playdate SDK / Simulator.
  2. Download the game and extract zipped folder.
  3. Run the Playdate Simulator.
  4. Ctrl + O and locate the extracted folder.
